Get NCAA Baseball Game Logs

Source: R/get_ncaa_game_logs.R
get_ncaa_game_logs.Rd

Get NCAA Baseball Game Logs

get_ncaa_game_logs(player_id, year = 2019, type = "batting", span = "game")

Arguments

player_id

A player's unique id. Can be found using the get_ncaa_baseball_roster function.
year

The year of interest.
type

The kind of statistics you want to return. Current options are 'batting' or 'pitching'.
span

The span of time; can either be 'game' for game logs in a season, or 'career' which returns seasonal stats for a player's career.

Value

A data frame containing player and school information as well as game by game statistics

Examples

# \donttest{
get_ncaa_game_logs(player_id = 2113782, year = 2021, type = "pitching", span = "game")
#>    player_id          player_name       Date                      Opponent

get_ncaa_game_logs(player_id = 1879650, year = 2019, type = "batting", span="career")
#>      Year player_id          player_name       Team GP BA  G OBPct SlgPct R AB
#> 3 2016-17   1879650 Fellows, Drake #66 P Vanderbilt 18    18                  
#> 4 2017-18   1879650 Fellows, Drake #66 P Vanderbilt 21    21                  
#> 5 2018-19   1879650 Fellows, Drake #66 P Vanderbilt 28    28
